AI Description: IQ-TREE 2 is a phylogenetic software tool that implements efficient algorithms for maximum-likelihood phylogenomic analysis of large datasets. It is designed to handle ultra-large alignment and provides a wide range of models for DNA, protein, codon, and amino acid substitution.
Core Features: Maximum-Likelihood Phylogenetic Analysis, Ultra-Large Dataset Handling, Support For Various Substitution Models (DNA, Protein, Codon, Amino Acid), Selection Of Best-Fit Model Via Modelfinder, Bootstrap & Bayesian Analysis, Phylogenetic Tree Visualization & Annotation
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Phylogenetics, Phylogenomic Analysis, Maximum Likelihood, Evolutionary Biology
